website_summaries.verdict: This unique saucer-like wheel provides a refreshing change for chinchillas who turn their snouts up at run-of-the-mill designs.
pros: Solid running surface is safe for tails and toes
Wide open design combats temperature spikes
Allows the spine to stay in a neutral position
Runs quieter than most similarly constructed upright wheels
Fussy chinchillas seem to enjoy it
cons: Lightweight construction has a tough time keeping up with energetic runners

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was almost a week late. Then, After a couple days of use the product broke. ( Ihave a small Syrian hamster) I contacted the seller to return the item since it was obviously a bad quality product and they response was that they DO NOT HAVE CONTROL OVER THE QUALITY TAHT THEY ARE JUST THE SELLER. Then, they advise to contact the manufacture because they do not offer a discount on this otras nether accept a return. This is my feedback: DO NOT BUT THIS PRODUCT. It is not worth the money!! It will break after a few days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible idea for chinchillas
customer_reviews.text: Terrible idea for chinchillas, I have ordered two of these and both snapped at the bearing in only 2 days!!! Chinchillas bring more weight then your common rodent plus they have a hop in there run as well. These are advertised for chinchillas which should 100% be considered False Advertising. Furthermore in case someone brings size into it. I've had a 5 year old and a 1 year old chinchilla break these cheep designs. Go with the Metal!!!! Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Hissy Pissy, my hedgehog. Once she acclimated to this weird contraption she loved it. There are times when it makes noise, but a dab of mineral oil and it goes away. Every morning it is covered in exercise poop, and this cleans very easily. And while it stood up excellently well to my 3lb hedgie, it did not stand up to my hubby’s rough cleaning!! There are fractures from the spoke outwards, earning hubby a promotion from cleaning the hedgie cage to cleaning all the litter boxes. He can break those. And rebuy me this.
customer_reviews.author: Anonermis

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 Days
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, broke after 4 days. I purchased this to replace the exact wheel I purchased for my hedgehog 3 months ago. The first wheel (same make and size) broke after only 2 months of use when the peg that attaches the wheel to the base splintered and the wheel would no longer attach for 4 days. I broke down and bought another a week ago to replace this product because my hedgie liked it so much, but the exact same part broke this time after only 4 days of use. Terrible quality, same part broke in the same way with both purchases. Do not waste your money, just buy a metal wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my hedgehog and after less than a month the base became separated from the wheel. I figured it was probably a dud and since I was within my return window, I sent it back and ordered another. The second one lasted 7 weeks and the exact same thing happened. The purpose for which it is intended is the exact action that causes it to break. This one I can not return because it's past the return policy window. Please do yourself a favor and buy a different item. Some are more expensive but I think I will end up going that route. They can't be any worse than this product.
customer_reviews.author: khaleesi_of_books

customer_reviews.title: All that I have bought were in great shape! Will continue to buy😸
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three new ones as I've become a bit of a hamster harder lol, the original four I bought were all in perfect condition and so are the three that were just delivered! Of course they wear out after a couple months because syrian hamsters run up to 6 MILES A DAY!😱 lol I will continue to buy them for as long as I own hamsters. I have both regular wheels and saucers and they seem to like the saucers more
customer_reviews.author: alexa montgomery

customer_reviews.title: My Syrian hamster's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Quieter than most wheels, doesn't interrupt my sleep and my hamster LOVES it, she actually uses it more than her wheel now. It seems to be pretty sturdy and well built. I definitely recommend it and if you have a Syrian big or small the large 12" is the only one suitable for it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and fairly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is great for our pet hedgehog. She runs on it every night and as long as it’s not scraping against the side of the cage it’s pretty quiet. Cleaning is fairly easy - warm water cleans the plastic quickly. Our hedgehog tends to poop and pee while running on it so depending on degree of dirtyness you may have to soak for an hour to clean. One caveat - I dropped it while cleaning once - it landed on the side of the wheel and the plat I cracked. Had to replace. So be careful not to drop.
customer_reviews.author: DougA

customer_reviews.title: 12 out of 13 rats ignored it.
customer_reviews.text: The Flying Saucer is well made and well conceived. It's relatively easy to clean, and very durable. The real downside is, that of the 13 rats I've had who have been exposed to the Flying Saucer, only one seemed to enjoy it, and used it regularly for running. The others just seem to be initially perplexed by the device, and quickly move on to ignoring it. These are rats who routinely use rodent balls to run around, and have figured out "puzzle" toys for rabbits and chinchillas in minutes, so I don't think it's an intelligence thing. I just don't think they like running.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Light
customer_reviews.text: This is very light so I had to modify it to make it so that it would stay where I placed it in my rats cage. I don't think it would necessarily tip but if your rats (or other pets) like to climb and jump on the top portion of this it might. It would also be very easy for rats or chinchillas to move it around in their habitat unless you found a way to hold it down or weight it down.
customer_reviews.author: The GreyOne

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR A CHINCHILLA!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is completely silent. I use it for my Syrian Hamster and she LOVES it. My hamster has a problem with always storing food in her wheel and running in it (silly hamster!) but this fixed the problem. Random color (I got green) wish I could have picked the color, but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Grim

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long, quality getting worse and worse
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd wheel this year. First purchased in January and last 9 months, I figured that was a fair life (no longer secure, too much play where wheel mounts to start, wobbles back and forth. Second wheel purchased in November, failed within 2 months, just now getting around to replacing it (my poor hedgehog). Third wheel just arrived today and came out of the box with movement in it, will not last long at all. Will have to search for another option as this is practically the only large enough saucer wheel on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Lueder

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Product was broken when it arrived. You could instantly tell that the cheap plastic that they used wouldn’t have held together long if it didn’t arrive broken. Also when I opened my package it wreaked of marijuana. Not very professional in my opinion. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone!!! Went to PetSmart and got one cheaper and better quality product. If I could give something zero stars it would be this product
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: At first this thing was great, but that only lasted a few days, it started being super noisy and snapped 2 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: suzie69

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for Hedgehogs
customer_reviews.text: We own 4 hedgehogs and needed to replace one 'silent' spinner that was broken. We look at the reviews and thought this should work with our hedgies... :( :( Nope, it didn't work for any of them. Instead of trying to run at the edge (bottom), all of them tried to cross over the center; with the expected result of them tripping over themselves and falling of the flying saucer (as we call it). We are now looking for other alternatives. We don't think it's fair with the product maker to give a low grade on the product; as the product isn't targeted for hedgehogs. But we wanted to give a warning for other hedgehog owners.
customer_reviews.author: JuanPablo Jofre

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this size since syrian hamsters are larger than most ...
customer_reviews.text: My syrian hamster loves this!! He spends so much time on it! No wheel or saucer is truly silent, but this is as close as you can get to that. I would definitely recommend this size since syrian hamsters are larger than most & a lot of products can be too small for them. It shipped fast & arrived in perfect condition. I would recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan Simon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: I noticed all the other reviews that mentioned how the saucer they ordered arrived broken. I doubted the saucer I would order would arrive broken as well... so I placed the order. Surprise- the saucer did in fact arrive broken and cracked, and I am extremely displeased. I don't understand how so many of these things arrive broken. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog has been using this wheel for four months now and at first it was great. It was absolutely quiet when he used it and then it gradually got louder. The sound isn't deafening by any means, but it's no longer silent. To top it off, I went to clean the wheel this morning and found that sometime during the night, it broke while my hedgehog was using it. The stem was broken at the base of the wheel and I sadly had to throw it away. I'm a little disappointed because I like the wheel and was happy with it, but I'm a little hesitant to buy another one if it's just going to break again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two weeks
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla LOVED this wheel, for about two weeks and then it broke. He’s a pretty small chinchilla too. I wanted to love this product, but it shouldn’t break within two weeks of owning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jilary

customer_reviews.title: Think mine was used
customer_reviews.text: I think I was sent one that was used, it does not work at all. I had one before this that lasted over a year, what a piece of garbage. I should have sent it back as soon as I got it.
customer_reviews.author: jjmmdd

customer_reviews.title: It was okay, had to replace it due to wobble/break
customer_reviews.text: It lasted a few months, and the idea is great so I wont give it a lower score. But ultimately it was not a long term product as I was expecting it to be. Unfortunate because the concept is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Quiet wheel alternative for large pets
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my hedgehog. She seems to love it. She's way too big to let her try to use a regular wheel, but by golly I hear her running away on this thing all the time. I'm actually surprised she liked it. It's not loud and doesn't squeak it just sounds like someone dragging paper across a desk. Not sure what else to compare it to, but it's really quiet.
customer_reviews.author: SmoreTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: We are hedgehog breeders and we've tried out every different type of wheel. This wheel is fin and easy to clean but it takes up a lot of cage space and breaks easily. The wheel is held to the base by a plastic pin. If you have a hog over 300g, the pin will break from normal use. If you happen to get a little rough with the wheel trying to separate it from the base, the pin will also snap off. Once the pin snaps, the wheel is unusable and so far, we haven't found a alternate fix. On average, these wheels lasted 2-3 months before breaking.
customer_reviews.author: ACloseShave

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Stabilized
customer_reviews.text: Poorly stabilized because the middle piece is lower than the legs supporting it... so we had to shave down the plastic just for it to sit flush with the floor. Our chinny loves running on it, but it makes a hell of a lot of noise compared to similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for hedgehogs...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying a metal wheel after going through a few of these. My hedgehog broke them easily and they're not able to be fixed once it happens. The wheel breaks off and can't be reattached. She didn't seem to be doing anything with it beyond trying to run on it, so I think maybe she as just too heavy for it or it's that flimsy. It might be good for rats or hamsters, though. I just don't recommend for hedgehogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control unit showed up defective :(
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this saucer. Units running dish is so warped it looks like a bent bicycle wheel. It needs to be replaced right away. How could quality control even let this product out the door. Packaging was perfect so it was made this way or stored improperly. What a shame It's a nice color and feels quality and spins great - oh but the wobble!
customer_reviews.author: AMCAZ RAMBLER

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my nephews hedgehog. It arrived Jan 30, and Louie the hedgie loved it. It broke yesterday, barely lasted 1 month. Such a disappointment. It was not quiet, but not extremely loud either, for those of you who want to know about sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for vigorous runners.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four of these wheels in the last 7 months. While I like the design, it's simply not durable enough for daily use. I have one average weight hedgehog. He has broken every single one. This last wheel lasted less than a week. He runs every night, most of the night. The shaft that holds the wheel onto the base breaks without fail. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Uninterested Ratties
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna be completely honest, my rats don't use this for excersise at all, haha. They do, however, use it to store prime pieces of bedding! (Don't ask me, I have no idea why) It arrived expediously and in perfect condition, but I can't get my boys to run on it. I think they're just picky though. They didn't like the Silent Spinner that I had for them previously either, which is actually why I opted for this saucer. Oh well! I'll just have to get creative, haha. Overall, I think this would probably be better suited to more adventurous ratties or chinchillas.
customer_reviews.author: islandbrat

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is sturdy and silent
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is sturdy and silent. We really like it. The rats don't tip it over. Easy to clean. The only problem is that our 3 female rats don't really use it. They occasionally jump on and back off again, and hide behind it. Might just be a personality thing, we got them at 8 wks and they didn't have a wheel before. So, we are also going to try a Silent Runner wheel.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quiet but breaks often
customer_reviews.text: Pretty quiet compared to other wheels. But it breaks more often. I’ve bought three in a year and a half. Buying the expensive Carolina Storm wheel on Etsy is looking better and better for my hedgehog. If you can buy two. When it breaks (and it will) you want a replacement immediately for your friend.
customer_reviews.author: David Ramesh

customer_reviews.title: Good for Syrian hamster
customer_reviews.text: First off, I don't have a chinchilla, so I don't know how well it works for its marketed use. However, this works great for my Syrian hamster. My hamster can no longer use her standard wheel because she figured out how to climb on top of it, and started to chew through the mesh lid of her cage. But with this saucer wheel it's not a problem. She runs for hours every night, and it's relatively quiet. The only drawback is that the base is made of a lightweight plastic, and she pushes it around in her cage sometimes. If the base were heavier and more sturdy it'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GrossFam

customer_reviews.title: It’s great but..
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it’s the ideal size for a syrian hamster or any large small animal lol. It’s best to use vegetable oil (safe for ingestion) on the joining section, as it may end up stiffening after a couple of hours of use. I kept mine near the edge of the bin cage, terrible idea, because once it got stiff, my hammy decided to jump out and escape. Got him tho and oiled the saucer up, and now he’s running with joy. I do recommend but be careful!
customer_reviews.author: amina

customer_reviews.title: Broken after less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Edit- I've had this less than 2 months and it's already broken. 😕 Past the return policy date. Very disappointed. My adult rats love this wheel! It's easy to clean, and although not silent, it doesn't make a huge amount of noise. I wish there was a way to anchor down to bottom of cage, but with the design, I'm not sure how that would work. Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase and the price is much lower than at the chain pet supply stores.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: The saucer is so squeaky. It wakes up everyone in the house because it's so loud. But our hedgehog loves it. Please tell me how to quiet it down.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than one month
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item less than one month ago. Only one of our rats uses the wheel. The plastic piece that connects the wheel to the base broke just from normal use. So the wheel is no longer usable. It was great while it lasted. Nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still Spinnin'
customer_reviews.text: My hamster has one of the regular wheels and this one. He runs on his other wheel for a few minutes, then jumps on this one for a few more. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for hedgehogs, but be prepared to buy again and again, as they break.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I've purchased. As I have a hedgehog, this is the best design for the safety of his back, and also the best height. Unfortunately, I have to buy a new one every year as the top breaks off the base.
customer_reviews.author: Krishelle

customer_reviews.title: IMHO best ergonomic wheel for my syrian, but broke, but fixable.
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo, IMHO this is the best ergonomic wheel for my syrian. However, after 2 months the wheel broke free from the base. (as others have said) Fortunately, my husband was able to fix it with some hardware and a drill. If you'd like to know more, feel free to comment and I can try to have hubby dictate how he did it. Now, unless the plastic cracks somewhere, this thing should last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: A. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wheel and has a nice look to it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wheel and has a nice look to it. Unfortunately, it breaks too easily. I have hedgehog and he runs with such vigor that he has broken three of these before I switched wheels. He loved the wheel but it just broke too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for Chinchillas
customer_reviews.text: I returned this immediately. My Chinchilla wouldn't even get on it. It's too small for chinchillas, even though it shows one on the label! It moves all over the place and flips because there is no weight to it I purchased a metal one from another manufacturer and my Chinchilla immediately began using it and loves the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Weep
customer_reviews.text: Sad. Was for a year old Syrian. Never got to use it. As for the product itself, it’s takes up space
customer_reviews.author: Hank Young

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, plastic attached to plastic.
customer_reviews.text: It broke after one day! It was squeaking and making strange noises. It is plastic attached to plastic not even a washer between.
customer_reviews.author: 0wad

customer_reviews.title: Hamster like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters hamster we got her for Christmas. The 1st one broke within 2 months of use. The plastic piece on base just wore off and made it tip side to side or come off base and was verrry noisy (we had to take it out at night to watch tv or sleep, which made the hamster mad) and it's not so quiet to begin with. But Ware customer service sent me a new one and although it's not as quiet as I would like it to be, it is quieter than the wheel we used to have and the hamster loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Returned - Enormous
customer_reviews.text: I thought since this was the next size up it would work for my Syrian hamster, but it's enormous, doesn't fit in the cage and way too large.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have stated this does seem to be a cheaper version of a previously very well designed wheel. The wheel itself does not detach from the base on this newer version making cleaning somewhat harder. Other than that it seems to be similar enough, I have been using it for moths with my sugar gliders and haven't had any breaking etc.
customer_reviews.author: Neff

customer_reviews.title: Wears out immediately
customer_reviews.text: This had a higher star rating when I purchased it. It worked wonderfully . . . for less than a month. Then it became loose and made all kinds of noise. It wasn't crazy hard to clean, but it took some scrubbing. When I came back on Amazon to find another one, another reviewer mentioned the Carolina Storm Express. I got one for our Syrian, and it's wonderful--easy to clean, hasn't made any noise at all in 3 months. I think a guy makes it from his home and connects a Razor Scooter wheel (high quality) to a circular plastic washbasin.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: quality needs to be improved, they break too quickly
customer_reviews.text: We have a large Syrian hamster and buy the large saucer. She likes running on them but we are on our fourth one in just over 1 year because the plastic piece that goes into the base has broken on every saucer. I am trying to find another brand that will not break with normal hamster use so quickly, but have not found one yet. She also has a silent spinner wheel and just doesn't enjoy running on it as much so I guess I will have to buy another one of these saucers.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog wheel
customer_reviews.text: Using this for a hedgehog. Had to secure to bottom of container by Velcro to keep from moving. Works well with minimal noise
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: I could of put a rock in the cage and it would of spun round better then this
customer_reviews.text: Moved around the cage bottom making it impossible for the animal to gain traction. I could of put a rock in the cage and it would of spun round better then this. I have seen heavy metal versions of this kind of saucer - perhaps the heaviness would keep it from moving around. Exotic Nutrition sells 2 sizes of the heavy metal saucers for about $38 and $45 I am using Wodent Wheel both the 11" and the 12" size.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Grey

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's not sturdy at all really, my rats can't get on it without it shifting which causes them to scutter off.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Gian

customer_reviews.title: My Rat's don't use it.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, but my rats don't use it except to lay on. Even the girls who are much more active and use their other upright wheel a lot, won't use this one. But I've had mice that just loved it! So, it probably depends on your animal and what it likes as to whether or not its a good choice for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tip overs can be solved
customer_reviews.text: My chin's love this saucer, but my fat boy would jump on the saucer and flip the entire thing on its side. Easy solution... Buy heavy duty velcro tape with sticky sides. I placed the soft side directly on the shelf (so the soft side is facing up), and I placed the rough/sticky part to the bottom of the saucer. I trimmed the rough part stuck to the saucer, but not part stuck to the shelf. I haven't had the saucer flip since applying, and I've been able to easily clean the shelves and saucer with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: 12" size was way to big for our two Exotic ...
customer_reviews.text: 12" size was way to big for our two Exotic Rats. No, they aren't fully grown, but the thing is way too huge for our 3 story cage, it takes up most of the lower right hand side of the cage. Haven't had it long enough to test for durability yet. They were checking it out early today. We will we see how long it lasts. Thought we would give it a go...my daughter was interested..will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Grinnay

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: It did not last long at all. At first it was going well. Then it started squeaking and my hamster is having a hard time running on it. Very disappointed because she really liked the saucer.
customer_reviews.author: charlene westbury

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the pet.
customer_reviews.text: This wheel lasted forever with my robo hamster but not with my heavy Syrian hamster. It got extremely wobbly after only a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Arguello

customer_reviews.title: Just get a quality metal one
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my baby chinchilla on Dec 9th. It broke last month which was past the return date. I emailed them to explain I didn't feel 22 bucks for a wheel that lasted less than 2 months was appropriate and no one has bothered to email me back. I can only deduce that it would last less time for a full grown chinchilla
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: My hedgehog did not know what to think!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hedgehog, and he was confused at first, but now he loves it! This is a great way for him to exercise, and adds enrichment to his enviorment. Unlike some other wheels, this has no risk of broken feet or toes (a risk with fragile heggies, especially climbers like mine) because there are no gaps, and it isn't very high off the floor of the cage. If you have a small cage, it takes up quite a bit of room. Fair warning, it does become a bit of a litter box, and therefore needs frequent rinsing. The pros far outweigh any cons, and Baron von Rabblehog loves his saucer. The product arrived promptly and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: wilde_thing

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome and my hedgehog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these wheels, the last one being last week. They are awesome and my hedgehog loves them, but they are put together terribly. The most recent one has already snapped apart in less than a week. Thankfully my husband has been able to fix them for the most part, until the saucer part begins to Crack. For the price, I think they should be bit better quality. Sadly there are no others out there like them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Horrible service
customer_reviews.text: A complete waste of money. I'd send it back but the post office is closed and I have no printer. It came in broken as if someone intentionally broke it to fit in the box. In fact I'm sure that happened since the two pieces were on oppisite side of the box. Completely disappointing. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be made More Substantial
customer_reviews.text: The company sent just what was ordered, and it arrived on time. I expected, especially since I ordered the large model, that it would be more durable. However, it only took a paperback book falling from 24"above exerciser (accidentally!!) and it broke. my fault, I know, but now knowing how flimsy it is made, will be searching for a sturdier product with that type of design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel, but it broke in half
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the wheel for my chinchilla. I wanted him to have it so he could run when I couldn’t let him out of his cage, but (of course) just over a month of having it, the spin piece broke off the base. And now I can’t return it. I’d like to buy another, but I don’t want the same thing to happen without the option of getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC & MIND BLASTING! Very Glad I got this Large Saucer!
customer_reviews.text: I got the large flying saucer for my fancy mice, a smaller size would be too small. Once they learned how it works, they always are on it. My fat mouse lost so much weight. Worth it's weight in gold! Warning, If you are letting them exercise in something without a lid, just watch them, because they are able to sometimes fling themselves outward, very funny, they don't seem to get hurt, but they might escape as they send themselves flying. It's fun to watch them. They love it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Parisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Couple Flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a silent wheel, and works great for hedgehogs to avoid getting their feet caught. It is very easy to clean in that the wheel can be removed from the stand. However, the downside to this product is that it is not entirely stable and the middle support can break, especially when the hedgehog uses it nightly, like it should. I had to buy three of these in my Hedgie's first year because they simply aren't strong enough. The reason why I kept buying this brand was because of how quiet it is, which was a huge benefit to having the hedgehog in the same room where I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: k smith

customer_reviews.title: Because I like the idea of a running saucer
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give this seller a chance, Because I like the idea of a running saucer, but now I see why these are difficult to come across in pet stores. It came cracked in two places on the saucer. I immediately applied super glue, but it currently doesn't seem to be working, because one of the cracks is huge. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Borealis

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a month...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a month. Small hamster used it and I'm assuming the bearing wore out. Don't buy this wheel, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragil plastic
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 day use. I have a 3 month old chinchilla which is the runt of the litter. Somehow it snapped and I was told to mail it back for a replacement. I would recommend not to buy this is my baby chin was break it after a 3 day use. The plastic is fragile around the neck. Unless you have a chinchilla that is as light as a feather, or under 3 months and smaller than my runt I would not recommend it. Chinchillas love to run and this doesn't allow that opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: MORTON

customer_reviews.title: NOT SILENT
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this one. It broke 3 days after it arrived. Its not designed well. It makes lots of noise. Also there is some kind of white powder in the wheel that I didn't want my hedgehog to be around. The base fell off. Wont order it again. It arrived fast and was packaged alrighy.
customer_reviews.author: Kinley Hall

customer_reviews.title: Well worth $2
customer_reviews.text: It should be sold for $2 i can't believe my wife bought it for $15. Well i can believe it she buys $2 crap for $15 all the time.Amazon has big windows because they see her coming from miles away. straight to the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wheel worked GREAT and my Degus loved it
customer_reviews.text: The wheel worked GREAT and my Degus loved it, but I woke up one morning 3 weeks after I bought it, and the darn this was popped off its hinge, disconnected from the base. I have no idea how it came undone, as no plastic seems warped or broken, I can't find any missing pieces, and it seems to be impossible to fit together with just the top and bottom plastic pieces. I am forced to buy a new one now and hope it doesn't happen again, since I can't find any information on how to fix it or a better sized wheel for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Clyne

customer_reviews.title: Sadly not working too well
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla didn’t like it due to it was too light and not stable enough
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Ok for Chins, needs adjustments though
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas love it, I'm not giving 5 stars to this product because it has some design defects, there's nothing to hold the saucer to the cage floor so when your chin runs the saucer just jumps all over the place, my dad had to drill the base and put some screws to make it still when the boys run. But I think it's the best you can gear for the price and even in the market, there are not many options for chinchillas.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My third one has become warped and is unuseable. My son's Syrian hamster is quite large and needed this size wheel, however we have had to stop using this one as it becomes warped and very noisy. Will look elsewhere, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary G Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this... But it Broke an hour after it was put into the chinchilla cage, and he didn't even run on it right away because he was afraid of it. Soon, he began slowly walking on it. Came back into the room about an hour later and the saucer was broken off of the base. No idea how he managed that.... He's so small!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, quiet too
customer_reviews.text: My rats aren't quite sure about it yet, but it's nice
customer_reviews.author: becky estep

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Better off paying the extra money for a metal wheel
customer_reviews.text: first of all the wheel was cracked when I first received it. I glued it back together so my chinchilla could at least use it.. for a short time. Only lasted 2 months before wheel detached from the base and is not able to be used at all now. Would not buy again. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a waste of $! i have a baby chinchilla less than a year old, not fully grown yet. i know this type of wheel is better for chinchilla because it is not mesh, and the angle is good for their backs. plus is was much quieter than my old standard metal large hamster wheel. unfortunately it didn't even last 12 hours before it was laying in two pieces in the cage. getting my $ back
customer_reviews.author: Gyen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It broke after less than a month. And I don’t think my chinchilla even used it that much. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Hamsters
customer_reviews.text: We have two Syrian Hamsters and they absolutely love their flying saucers. They are really silent. The 12 inch size were perfect for the Hamsters. It's definitely not recommended for Chinchillas or any animal of that size. The purple saucer is nice an vibrant, the blue one is more like a royal blue, it's also pretty. The price is really good ($14.75 on Prime). I saw it at Petco for $35.00.
customer_reviews.author: Hamsterman

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had it for a month yet and it’s already squeaking when my hedgie runs on it. It is sturdy and as much as he tries he hasn’t been able to flip it. But it’s too noisy when he runs. I will be looking at a different wheel soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Raper

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog likes but they keep breaking.
customer_reviews.text: My male hedgehog loves this wheel. He uses it every night. That said, he has now broken two in the last month (the part where they run on has actually snapped off the axis). The last one he broke in less than 5 days. I like this wheel a lot (because he likes it) but would not recommend it because they break so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: Unbalance, but good product
customer_reviews.text: Is a good product we loved it, however whenever she's spinning it makes a sounds. That is the only problem, that is unbalanced this makes the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthya Aranda

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel hamsters use it all night.
customer_reviews.text: One piece doesn't fall apart no risk of injury for small Animals. Syrian hamster for on large wheel. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissi

customer_reviews.title: Great product - lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 rats because I was concerned the normal wire and plastic "wheel" types would lead to injury of their tails or heads. While none of my rats actually use this to run on (they simply aren't wheel runners) they all used this to swing themselves around or propel and launch themselves across the bottom level or their cage.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh LTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get/buy replacement connectors
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of the large 12" saucers so far and while they are plenty big for my little hedgehog, the white piece that connects the saucer to the base has broken after jut about 2 months of use. Maybe my hedgehog is too into physical fitness? If I could buy replacement parts, I would rate this product at least a 4 because my little Priscilla sure loves it until I find it in 2 pieces and her looking at me like it was me that broke it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Brotski

customer_reviews.title: Hamster refused to use it after day 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Syrian hamster that had outgrown his exercise wheel. For the first two nights he really enjoyed it but then abruptly stopped and wouldn't go near it. I can only assume that he fell or that it shifted and it scared him. I replaced it with a standard 12" exercise wheel and he has been very content.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: 25" saucer for my Sugar Gliders and it is fine. I wanted to give my little guys a ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the 7.25" saucer for my Sugar Gliders and it is fine. I wanted to give my little guys a bit more room to scamper so I upgraded to the 12" saucer and it is broken after only 4 months. I would not recommend the 12" size saucer.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Was very nice at first
customer_reviews.text: Was very nice at first. My small female rat loves to run, within a few weeks she broke this saucer off of the stand from running so much. I wish these were made a little more sturdy. Yes they are small animals using them but when they use them daily they tend to break faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Can't hold up to chinchillas that love to run
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a week or two and then one morning the wheel broke off the base. It's also quite wobbly and moved around her cage all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Best hamster wheel
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quiet wheel for our hamster. We have 2 and they both prefer this style to the normal closed wheel. This wheel is also more beneficial for their health because it doesnt arch their back like the more enclosed wheels. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a week before it broke in half. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: inkblot

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty flimsy. The top broke off from the base, and the base also cracked. We kept using it because a tiny piece of the hub was still hanging on for dear life, and my Syrian hamsters kept loving to use it. For safety reasons, we'll need to throw it out. Can't imagine this being used for a bigger animal like a chinchilla or rat.
customer_reviews.author: amesable

customer_reviews.title: Noiseless, Flat, and My hamster loves it
customer_reviews.text: On my old wheel my hamster kept climbing on top and falling off, but this wheel is flat, safer, and nearly noiseless. My hamster finds it easier to run on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased our second flying saucer a week and a half ago to replace one that was bought at Christmas time. The first one broke within a couple of months but was still useable by our average size hedgehog for another few months until the piece that holds the base to saucer broke completely off. The replacement lasted only a week and a half and this time I'm looking for a different type of wheel as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a couple weeks of normal use.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it two stars, because it is indeed a quiet spinner. But I've purchased two of them for my chinchilla, and both have broken in only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L. Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Not great for hedgehogs.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long before breaking, and the ridges in the disc are hard on little hedgehog feet.
customer_reviews.author: Untamed_Jade

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, arrived broken in many places. Theres no way it would withstand a chinchilla for long.
customer_reviews.author: learn

customer_reviews.title: Poor Rat!
customer_reviews.text: This flying saucer might work for a small gerbil or hamster - but our poor pet rat has broken two within a months time! The "pin" that holds the saucer to the stand is made of week plastic; wish it was made of metal, that way this saucer would be great! Amazon was very good with sending us a replacement right away; so a big plus to them for that!
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Beware! This product is not silent and moves around the cage when being used. Also the wheel broke completely off the base in a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: It was an amazing item until the chinchilla's literally ran it off of ...
customer_reviews.text: It was an amazing item until the chinchilla's literally ran it off of the stand. I would recommend that the manufacturer try and find a way to stabilize the base so that they are stationary and aren't able to wobble it all over.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzanna

product_meta.title: Ware Manufacturing Flying Saucer Exercise Wheel for Small Pets, 12-Inch - Colors May Vary
product_meta.description: Color:BasicWare Manufacturing's Large Sized Flying Saucer Exercise Wheel is a great choice for promoting a fun and active lifestyle that will keep your pet happy. Your pets will love the solid running surface which is completely safe for your pets feet and tail. This exercise wheel is amazing and provides hours upon hours of fun. Great for relieving cage boredom your pets will run for hours on this well designed exercise wheel. This Flying Saucer Exercise Wheel is designed to be completely silent during use, which helps keep the noise down from running pets. Ware Manufacturing's Flying Saucer Exercise Wheel is the perfect solution for giving your pet a wheel to run that is safe and silent. Measures 12" Width X 12" Depth X 7.5" Height
feature_bullets: Large size plastic flying saucer small pet exercise wheel
Totally toe and tail safe exercise wheel; quiet motion
Small pets love the solid running surface; fun colors
Measures 12-inch width by 12-inch depth by 7-1/2-inch height
Your Pet Will Love to Run on The Flying Saucer Exercise Wheel
Solid Running Surface is Great for Small Pets
Completely Safe for Your Pets Tail and Feet
Promotes Exercise Leading to a Happy and Healthy Pet
Pet Owners Love the Quiet Spinning Operation
Measures 12" Width X 12" Depth X 7.5" Height
